item.description:
We are meeting at the Campus Center in the Quadrangle of Lesley University ( Near Harvard Law school/dorms). We will meet outside (There should be tables outside) if not we will meet on the grass area) or inside at a table. (either downstairs or up). There is internet hook ups too inside someone could bring a lap top and we could may be do some internet searching or listen to CD's or go Chinesepodcast.com and do some things. You will need a cable cord (not phone cord) to hook it to the cable outlet upstairs. If brininging CD's or laptop, please note it in your RSVP. Thanks.

Take Care,

Adele

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Meet up in Cambridge (Lesley College Campus Center), 1pm 8/11
